Which statement is true about the following?

[root@server1 ~]# ls /etc/rc1.d

K08tomcat7 K20screen-cleanup K80etables s70dns-clean

K20postfix K20zfs-mount K85bind9 S70pppd-dns
results.correct_answer: bind9 daemon will be stopped when entering Level 1
results.incorrect_answers__001: postfix daemon will be started when entering Level 1
results.incorrect_answers__002: zfs-mount daemon will be started when entering Level 1
incorrect_answers: postfic daemon will be started when entering Level 1
zfs-mount daemon will be started when entering Level 1
results.answer1: bind9 daemon will be stopped when entering Level 1
results.answer2: postfic daemon will be started when entering Level 1
results.answer3: zfs-mount daemon will be started when entering Level 1
